DATA.TEXT: Oy, this comic is awesome! The Baron's such a freaking badass!
Ooh, the Baron vs the Gauntlet! I think it was my mom who wrote that story...
Wait, your mom is Ruth Hulu? I saw her at a local convention recently, up on the upper-east quadrant! She seemed sooo nice!
Y-Yeah, she is! Um... Upper-east quadrant, right?
